article.title: Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
article.summary: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.

all_candidates.title: AI for self empowerment
all_candidates.summary: How AI can expand human agency by closing the capability overhang—helping people, businesses, and countries unlock real productivity, growth, and opportunity.

all_candidates.title: A business that scales with the value of intelligence
all_candidates.summary: OpenAI’s business model scales with intelligence—spanning subscriptions, API, ads, commerce, and compute—driven by deepening ChatGPT adoption.

all_candidates.title: 元OpenAI幹部、AI監査の非営利団体「AVERI」設立　「家電並みの安全確認」を目指す
all_candidates.summary: 元OpenAI幹部のマイルズ・ブランデージ氏が、AIの第三者監査を推進する非営利団体「AVERI」を発足させた。企業の自己採点に依存する現行の安全性評価を改善するため、4段階の「AI保証レベル」や評価ツール「BenchRisk」を開発。主要AI企業や投資家と連携し、社会インフラとしてのAIの信頼性担保を目指す。
